sqlReaderQuery.value:
select
    def1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET as DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER as DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR as DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI as DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT as DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS as DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS,
    def1.DISPLAYVALUE_SITE as DISPLAYVALUE_SITE,
    def1.LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME as LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
    dpt1.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE1_NAME_DEPARTMENT,
    desc1_b.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERCOMPANY,
    desc1_c.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SALES_CHANNEL,
    desc1_d.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_TYPE,
    desc1_e.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_CATEGORY,
    desc1_f.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FAMILY,
    desc1_g.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SIZE,
    desc1_h.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_VERSION,
    desc1_k.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FOAM_SOURCED,
    desc1_m.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_M_SALES_DISTRI,
    desc1_proj.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_PROJECTS,
    desc1_site.DESCRIPTION as DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SITE,
    desc1_l.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE2_NAME_STORE,
    dpt3.NAME as DIRPARTYTABLE3_NAME_BUSINESS_UNIT,
    (
        SELECT
            MAX(LastUpdateDate)
        FROM
            (
                VALUES
                    (def1.LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME),
                    (isnull (desc1_b.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_c.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_d.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_e.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_f.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_g.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_h.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_k.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_m.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_proj.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01')),
                    (isnull (desc1_site.DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME, '1950-01-01'))       
            ) AS UpdateDate (LastUpdateDate)
    ) AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    (select distinct davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION as DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'A_Department' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'B_Intercompany' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'D_Type' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'E_Category' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'F_Family' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'G_Size' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'H_Version' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'I_Customer' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'J_Vendor' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'L_Store' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'M_Sales_Distri' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'BusinessUnit' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'MainAccount' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'Projects' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS
	, max(
		case when da1.NAME = 'Site' then dalv1.DISPLAYVALUE
			else null
			end
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as DISPLAYVALUE_SITE
	, max(
		(select max(i) from (values (davgc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dalv1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dav1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da1.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i))
		) over (partition by davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUECOMBINATION) as LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUEGROUPCOMBINATION davgc1
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTELEVELVALUE dalv1 on
	davgc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUEGROUP = dalv1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUEGROUP
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE dav1 on
	dalv1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUE = dav1.RECID
left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da1 on
	dav1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da1.RECID
) def1
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt1 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT = dpt1.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'B_Intercompany') desc1_b on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY = desc1_b.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'C_Sales_Channel') desc1_c on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL = desc1_c.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'D_Type') desc1_d on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE = desc1_d.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'E_Category') desc1_e on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY = desc1_e.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'F_Family') desc1_f on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY = desc1_f.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'G_Size') desc1_g on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE = desc1_g.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'H_Version') desc1_h on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = desc1_h.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'K_Foam_Sourced') desc1_k on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED = desc1_k.VALUE
left join (select rct1.STORENUMBER
				, max(dpt1.NAME) as NAME
			from dbo.RETAILCHANNELTABLE rct1
			left join dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE dpt1 on
				rct1.OMOPERATINGUNITID = dpt1.RECID
			group by rct1.STORENUMBER) desc1_l on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE = desc1_l.STORENUMBER
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'M_Sales_Distri') desc1_m on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI = desc1_m.VALUE
left join (select OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
			, max(NAME) as NAME
		from dbo.DIRPARTYTABLE
		group by OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER) dpt3 on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT = dpt3.OMOPERATINGUNITNUMBER
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'Projects') desc1_proj on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS = desc1_proj.VALUE
left join (select distinct dft1.VALUE
				, max(dft1.DESCRIPTION) over (partition by dft1.VALUE order by dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME desc)  as DESCRIPTION
				, (select max(i) from (values (dft1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (dadc1.MODIFIEDDATETIME), (da2.MODIFIEDDATETIME)) AS T(i)) as DESC_MODIFIEDDATETIME
			from dbo.DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG dft1
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEDIRCATEGORY dadc1 on
				dft1.FINANCIALTAGCATEGORY = dadc1.DIRCATEGORY
			left join dbo.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE da2 on
				dadc1.DIMENSIONATTRIBUTE = da2.RECID
			where da2.NAME = 'Site') desc1_site on
	def1.DISPLAYVALUE_SITE = desc1_site.VALUE

Select 
    dimensionattributevalueset As DIMENSIONATTRIBUTEVALUESET,
    DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT AS DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
    DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY AS DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
    DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL AS DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
    DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE AS DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
    DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY AS DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
    DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY AS DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
    DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE AS DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
    DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION AS DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
    DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER AS DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER,
    DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR AS DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR,
    DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED AS DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
    DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE AS DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
    DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI AS DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI,
    DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT AS DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
    DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT AS DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT,
    DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS AS DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS,
    DISPLAYVALUE_SITE AS DISPLAYVALUE_SITE,
    LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME AS LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME,
	dpt1.name AS DIRPARTYTABLE1_NAME_DEPARTMENT,
    dft1.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_INTERCOMPANY,
    dft2.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SALES_CHANNEL,
    dft3.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_TYPE,
    dft4.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_CATEGORY,
    dft5.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FAMILY,
    dft6.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SIZE,
    dft7.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_VERSION,
    dft8.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_FOAM_SOURCED,
    dft9.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_M_SALES_DISTRI,
    dft10.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_PROJECTS,
    dft11.description AS DIMENSIONFINANCIALTAG_DESCRIPTION_SITE,
    dpt2.name AS DIRPARTYTABLE2_NAME_STORE,
    dpt3.name AS DIRPARTYTABLE3_NAME_BUSINESS_UNIT,
    LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME AS LATEST_MODIFIEDDATETIME
from
    (
        select distinct
            davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'a_department' Then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'b_intercompany' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'c_sales_channel' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'd_type' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'e_category' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'f_family' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_F_FAMILY,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'g_size' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'h_version' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'i_customer' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_I_CUSTOMER,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'j_vendor' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_J_VENDOR,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'k_foam_sourced' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'l_store' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'm_sales_distri' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'businessunit' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'mainaccount' then davsi1.displayvalue --davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_MAIN_ACCOUNT,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'projects' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS,
            max(
                case
                    when lower(da1.name) = 'site' then davsi1.displayvalue
                    else null
                end
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as DISPLAYVALUE_SITE,
            max(
                (
                    select
                        max(i)
                    from
                        (
                            values
                                (davsi1.modifieddatetime),
                                (davc1.modifieddatetime),
                                (dav1.modifieddatetime),
                                (da1.modifieddatetime),
                                (desc1.desc_modifieddatetime)
                        ) as t(i)
                )
            ) over (
                partition by
                    davsi1.dimensionattributevalueset
            ) as  LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME

        From 
			dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevaluesetitem davsi1
            left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevaluecombination davc1 on davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = davc1.recid
            left join  (Select  t1.recid 
						From dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.custtable  t1               
						Cross Join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable t2
						 Where
    (
        t1.party = t2.recid
        And ( t1.partition = t2.partition )
    )) As dact1  
			on davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dact1.recid
            left join (Select t3.recid From dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.vendtable  t3               
						Cross Join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable t2
						 Where
    (
        t3.party = t2.recid
        And ( t3.partition = t2.partition )
    )) As davt1 
	on davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = davt1.recid
            left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributevalue dav1 on davsi1.dimensionattributevalue = dav1.recid
            left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da1 on dav1.dimensionattribute = da1.recid
            left join (
                select
                    dft1.value,
                    da2.name,
                    dft1.description,
                    (
                        select
                            max(i)
                        from
                            (
                                values
                                    (dft1.modifieddatetime),
                                    (dadc1.modifieddatetime),
                                    (da2.modifieddatetime)
                            ) as t (i)
                    ) as desc_modifieddatetime
                from
                    dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag dft1
                    left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattributedircategory dadc1 on dft1.financialtagcategory = dadc1.dircategory
                    left join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionattribute da2 on dadc1.dimensionattribute = da2.recid
            ) desc1 on davsi1.displayvalue = desc1.value
            and da1.name = desc1.name
    ) def1
    left join (
        Select omoperatingunitnumber
	 ,max(d1.name) As name
 From
    dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit a1
	Inner Join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable d1
	On a1.recid = d1.recid
	Group By omoperatingunitnumber
    ) As dpt1 
	On def1.DISPLAYVALUE_A_DEPARTMENT = dpt1.omoperatingunitnumber
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft1 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_B_INTERCOMPANY = dft1.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft2 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_C_SALES_CHANNEL = dft2.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft3 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_D_TYPE = dft3.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft4 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_E_CATEGORY = dft4.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft5 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_K_FOAM_SOURCED = dft5.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft6 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_G_SIZE = dft6.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft7 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = dft7.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft8 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_H_VERSION = dft8.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft9 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_M_SALES_DISTRI = dft9.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft10 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_PROJECTS = dft10.value
    left join (
        select
            value,
            max(description) as description
        from
            dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dimensionfinancialtag
        group by
            value
    ) dft11 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_SITE = dft11.value
    left join (
        Select omoperatingunitnumber
	 ,max(d2.name) As name
 From
    dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit a2
	Inner Join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable d2
	On a2.recid = d2.recid
	Group By omoperatingunitnumber
    ) dpt2 on def1.DISPLAYVALUE_L_STORE = dpt2.omoperatingunitnumber
    left join (
        Select omoperatingunitnumber
	 ,max(d3.name) As name
 From
    dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.omoperatingunit a3
	Inner Join dataverse_nalatst_cds2_workspace_unqe092999b0ee2ee1190466045bda8c.dbo.dirpartytable d3
	On a3.recid = d3.recid
	Group By omoperatingunitnumber
    ) As dpt3 
	On def1.DISPLAYVALUE_BUSINESS_UNIT = dpt3.omoperatingunitnumber
    where 
LEDGERDIMENSION_MODIFIEDDATETIME > '10/1/2024'
